title: Naaemul Haq’s demise great loss to PTI: Amin Aslam
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 16 (APP):Adviser to the Prime Minister on Climate Change Malik Amin Aslam condoled the sad demise of Special Assistant to the Prime Minister on Political Affairs Naeemul Haq.
In a tweet, he said, “A great loss for Pakistan Tehreek e Insaf (PTI) as its founding member Naeemul Haque passes away – a true ideologue and patriot.”
“May Allah bless his departed soul and grant him jannah Ameen,” he tweeted.
